name: polar-h10-visualizer
description: Visualization for polar h10 ecg sensor
author: Yuhui Zhao

scripts.cp-file: npm run download-font ; mkdir -p build && cp src/index.html build/ && cp -r src/styles build/ && cp src/favicon.ico build/ && cp node_modules/@spectre-org/spectre-css/dist/spectre.min.css build/styles/ && cp node_modules/@spectre-org/spectre-css/dist/spectre-icons.min.css build/styles
scripts.dev: npm run cp-file && npm run add-coi && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --outfile=build/index.js --sourcemap --define:window.IS_PRODUCTION=false --watch --servedir=build --allow-overwrite --format=esm
scripts.build: npm run cp-file && npm run add-coi && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --outfile=build/index.js --sourcemap --define:window.IS_PRODUCTION=true --allow-overwrite --format=esm --minify --tree-shaking=true
